10 Gsg001.001 ka 1b1-117a6 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po sarba d+harma ma hA san d+hi tsit+ta ku la ya rA dza rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge dang/ dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
1100 Gsg001.002 ka 117b1-129a3 la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
1129 Gsg001.003 ka 129a5-158b5
byang chub kyi sems shes bya mtha' gcod kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so
13 Gsg001.004 ka 159a1-222b7 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub sems su 'dus pa'i mdo sarba d+harmaHsan+d+hi ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta sU tra
xxx Gsg001.005 ka 223a1-234a5 bkra shis pa'i dpal s+vasti shrIH bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sin+ha dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
1 Gsg001.006 ka 234a6-250a7 byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA pu Sh+Ta tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrU sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'i
31 Gsg001.007 ka 250b1-255a2 byang chub sems bsgom pa b+ho d+hi tsit+ta sa mA d+hi rdzogs so
69 Gsg001.008 ka 255a4-262a2 byang chub sems rdo rje 'od phro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra pra b+ha tan+t+ra nA ma rgyud kyi rgyal po mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud rdzogs so
3 Gsg001.009 ka 262a5-265a1 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa na dang/ rgya nag gi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+has bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
1119 Gsg001.010 ka 265a2-265b1 rje btsan dam pa tsa ra sha ar+thA rdzogs so
164 Gsg001.011 ka 265b2-267a5
byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba'i thig le tig rgzogs so
7 Gsg001.012 ka 267a6-268b5 srog gi 'khor lo a yo tsa kra srog gi 'khor lo rdzogs so
5 Gsg001.013 ka 268b6-270b5
byang chub sems nam mkha'i rgyal po rdzogs so
6 Gsg001.014 ka 271a1-276b1
byang chub sems rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bya ba bsam gtan rdzogs so
165 Gsg001.015 ka 276b2-277b3 bde 'jam many+dzu su kha bde 'jam rdzogs so
9 Gsg001.016 ka 277b4-278b7 bde ba phra bkod su kha pra ka te byang chub sems bde ba phra bkod pa rdzogs so
166 Gsg001.017 ka 279a1-279b4 kun 'dus sarba a ta byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus rdzogs so
167 Gsg001.018 ka 280a1-280b7
gnams spar 'debs rdzogs so
8 Gsg001.019 ka 281a1-283b3 byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i myu gu bo d+hi tsit+ta su kha bin du he tsi byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i myu gu rdzogs so
168 Gsg001.020 ka 283b4-284a5
rdzogs pa spyi gcod ces bya ba rdzogs so
1131 Gsg001.021 ka 284a6-284b3
byang chub kyi sems khams gsum sgron ma rdzogs so
52 Gsg001.022 ka 285a1-296a4 byang chub sems bsgom pa'i rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta a bA ya tan+t+ra byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud theg pa'i snying po rdzogs so
406 Gsg001.023 ka 296b1-303a3 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi de med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmA/ ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe da A kA sha san+ta tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
26 Gsg001.024 ka 304a1-312a5 chos thams cad byang chub kis sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmA/ ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa mu sa man+ta b+hi la tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gi mkhan po shri sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
27 Gsg001.025 ka 312b1-318b6 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mu la ts+tshed da sU r+ya tsan+d+ra sa ma ta a ma la tan+t+ra rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
29 Gsg001.026 ka 319a1-326b4 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nad gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mu la ts+tshe da ma ha rat+na sa man+ta a bud pa to tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhhan po shrI sing ha dang/ bos kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// /snga 'gyur lnga dang phyi 'gyur bcu gsum gyi rgyud la rnyi ba'i ban chung nyi ma rdo rjes byas pa
66 Gsg001.027 ka 327a1-352a5 ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud dz+nyA na gu h+ya nA ma tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho// //san+d+hi ma hA gu h+ya na ma tan+t+ra/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha fang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pa gor bai ro tsa nas/ yul d+ha he na'i 'dus khang du sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
67 Gsg001.028 ka 352b1-364b7 byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta a ti dz+nyA na san+d+hi tan+t+ra nA ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ba'o
64 Gsg001.029 ka 365a1-376a6 ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba dz+nyA na gu h+ya ri bu ma rat+na u pa de sha tan+t+ra bA ma ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //paN Ti ta shri sing+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas man ngag gi rgyud gtan la phab pa'o
62 Gsg001.030 ka 377a1-388a5 rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rat+na A r+ya pa tha da ri tan+t+ra nA ma rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta shrI sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o End of the volume: 'di khams lugs kyi rgyud gsang bsgron ma'i bzhug la bris shig ces pa 'dug
63 Gsg002.001 kha 1b1-114b5 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po badzra sat+va kha sa mAn+ta ma hA tan+t+ra nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la pha pa'o/ /gzhung tshad bam po bcu gcig pa'o
63 Gsg002.002 kha 115a1-172b2 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po badzra sat+va kha sa mAn+ta ma hA tan+t+ra byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //kha sa mAn+ta chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bgyur ro
51 Gsg002.003 kha 173a1-184b5 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che gsang ba'i snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud badzra gu h+ya gar+b+ha sa t+va ma hA kha b+h+yer+tha tan+t+ra rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud rdzogs so
1118 Gsg002.004 kha 185a1-221b1 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che kun tu bzang po gsang ba snying po'i rgyud badzra sat+va kha sya mahA/ sa man+ta b+ha dra gu h+ya gar+b+ha tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
1120 Gsg002.005 kha 222a1-233a6 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud badzra sat+va sa ya khe ma hA de ha puSh+TiM ga ra tan+t+ra bram ze rgyas pa rdzogs so
171 Gsg002.006 kha 233b1-249a6 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud
rdzogs s+ho
40 Gsg002.007 kha 250a1-269b7 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud badzra sa t+va ma hA A ka sha puSh+Ta nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa/ phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos pa'o
172 Gsg002.008 kha 270a1-273a4 byang chub sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bos kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o page 273 !
48 Gsg002.009 kha 274a1-287'a5 byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ra tsa nu ha tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho// //byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba' phyi ma ta ma nyid dang gsum bzhugs pa las/ zab mo bu ti'i lha khang du bu gnyis lus so/ /slob dpon bu d+d+ha kup+tas snums bar bzhengs nas/ lan gcig gzigs pas/ gnod sbyin kha rtsal gyi 'graxxx du thal lcag gcig rgyab nas brgyal bar gyur to/ brgyal sangs pa dang/ srin po lta bu'i tshul du 'dug pas smras pa/ gnas khang rgyal par gyur pa 'di nyid lyo rgyal po ,e 'od khyod kyi me khyer ro/ /gal te khyer na khyod nyid bsad par bya/ zhes smras pas/ bred nas dngangs nas/ ma ni gong du spyan gzhan zhig tu drangs/ bu gnyis der lus so/ /gang de nyid rnam par 'grel ba la/ /dgos don gsal 'tshad don la 'char ba ni/ /ma bu gsum nas drangs nas gtan la phab/ /phyi nas blo'i zer las skyod nas bya bzod na/ 'phags thugs 'gal dang 'phral du gnod sbyin mos/ /bar chad byed phyir blo'i gzer la skyod/ /las stod mkhas pa mgon po la/ myang stod lce nag bdud rstis zhus
1121 Gsg002.010 kha 288a1-320a6 bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u ma hA su kha/ bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
48 Gsg002.011 kha 321a1-355b1 byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ lo tsa ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o// //shrI sing+ha sang/ bai ro tsa nas sngar yang bsgyur
65 Gsg002.012 kha 356a1-362a5 rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud rat+na tsakra nA ma tan tra rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho
157 Gsg002.013 kha 363a1-364a7
dz+nyA na tsakra xxx rdzogs s+ho// xxx
173 Gsg003.001 ga 1b1-17a2 rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud san ti ma hA dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan tra rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //bu la gtad do pha'i btsas/ /snod med rnams ka shor rar/ /rdzogs pa chen po klong dgu bam po 'bum sde las/ 'di las zab pa mi bzhugs so/ /rdo rje mkha'gros bsrungs shig /sa maa ya/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha sang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba A tsar+ya bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gta nla phab'o
174 Gsg003.002 ga 17a3-37b1 byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba bshad pa'i rgyud gsal ba mtha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta ma sA san d+hi dz+nyA na gu h+ya shI tan tra pra ka sa ko d+hi sa ma d+ha nA ma
175 Gsg003.003 ga 37b1-53a2 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rtsa ba'i rgyud skye ba med pa badzra kha sa mU la a rdzogs so
176 Gsg003.004 ga 53a2-72b3 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyal po rgyas pa'i rgyud badzra sat+va/ kha se ma hA rA dza puSh+TiM tan+t+ra
177 Gsg003.005 ga 72b4-83a3 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i rgyud ces bya ba badzra sat+va ga ga sems hA tan+t+ra nA ma rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i rgyud rdzogs so
178 Gsg003.006 ga 83a4-150a6 byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po mkha' mnyam klong gi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA san+d+hi kha sa me a lang+ka ra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
179 Gsg003.007 ga 150a7-152a3 ye shes mdzod chen chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA na ma hA ko Sha e d+harma rdzogs s+ho
180 Gsg003.008 ga 152a4-153b4 ye shes gsang chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA na pra ka sa e d+harma
181 Gsg003.009 ga 153b5-154b5 ye shes 'bar ba chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA dz+va la e d+harma d+hA tu
182 Gsg003.010 ga 154b5-156a5 ye shes sa gcig chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA d+harma e d+harma d+hA tu rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhas pa shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o
183 Gsg003.011 ga 156b1-174b7 byang chub kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho klong dgu'i rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta a lang+ka ra a man+ta b+ha ba nA ma rdzogs s+ho
184 Gsg003.012 ga 175a2-184b2 byang chub sems kun 'dus 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta bin d+ha pra b+ha ni tan+t+ra nA ma byang chub sems kun 'dus 'od kyi tan+t+ra rdzogs so
185 Gsg003.013 ga 185a1-199b6 ye shes rin chen 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba dz+nyA na pra b+ha rat+na tan+t+ra nA ma rin po che 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha dang/ lo tsa ba bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i du khang du bsgyur ba'o
186 Gsg003.014 ga 200a1-223a2 byang chub sems nya mo 'khor lo'i rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ping ta ki tsakra tan tra
187 Gsg003.015 ga 223a4-241b2 yi ge 'bru bshad las kyi 'khor lo dun te mi le karma tsakra
188 Gsg003.016 ga 241b2-243b7
byang chub kyi sems thig pa nya mo bgal nyal rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o
189 Gsg003.017 ga 244a1-248b4 rig pa nam mkha' ltar gsal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud tsit+ta pas mo g+ha bod d+ha ye nA ma rig pa nam mkha' ltar gsal ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya'o
190 Gsg003.018 ga 249a1-270b7 thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo skye ba med pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud sarba kha k+Sha a ba yan bo d+hi tsit+ta tan tra
191 Gsg003.019 ga 271a1-274a4
byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho
192 Gsg003.020 ga 274a4-277a3 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud/ rnal 'byor dam pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar giy mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+bha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phabs pa'o
193 Gsg003.021 ga 277a3-279b5
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs las byung ba mthong bar dka' ba'i don rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar pas kyang bsabs pa'o
31 Gsg003.022 ga 280a1-282b6 byang chub sems bsgom pa bod+hi tsit+ta rdzogs s+ho
194 Gsg003.023 ga 283a1-291a7 rdzogs pa chen po lta ba dmar 'byam lta ba'i rgyud san+d+hi ma hA pra ka ra tan+t+ra nA ma
406 Gsg003.024 ga 291b1-301a7 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ye shes 'od kyi rgyud sarba d+harma ma hA san d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sA ra mU la tshe da ma hA A kA sha sa man+ta dz+nyA na pra b+ha tan+t+ra nam mkha' dang myanm pa ye shes 'od kyi rgyud rdzogs so
196 Gsg003.025 ga 302a1-382b7 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba sarba d+harma san ta k+Sha pa rA na tan tra ma hA na ma ma hA a ti yo ga g+hu h+ya pra de sha/ kha sa man ta na ma kha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge'i 'od can gyi zhal lda nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong gan jag rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gzigs pa des/ yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du/ bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
197 Gsg003.026 ga 383a1-407a5 byang chub kyi sems nam mkha' rgya mtsho rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta kha ma se ta a kam ka ra san ti ma hA gu h+ya tan tra ra dza nA ma byang chub kyi sems/ rdzogs pa chen po/ klong chen rab 'byams/ rgyal ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ nam mkha' rgya mtsho rol pa chen po'i snang ba chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho
60 Gsg004.001 nga 1b1-13a6 byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po rig pa rang rtsal shar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta b+ha dra da na bi d+ya tra ni tsa ni pra tan+t+ra nA ma rdzogs so
33 Gsg004.002 nga 13a6-24a5 byang chub sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes bdun gyi rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA san+d+hi dz+nyA nA tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho
59 Gsg004.003 nga 24a5-39b3 kun tu bzang po nam mkha' chen rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rgyud mA la pu tra sya ra kha sya mahA tan+t+ra kun tu bzang po nam mkha' che/ rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //dga' rab rdo rje ka zhus pa'o/ /man ngag rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rygud/ chos nyid mi 'gyur rgyas btab gzhag/ ban chung 'khyams po bdag gis drangs/ /bod nas rgya gar yul gyi bar/ /bka' ba bc+vo rgyas spyad pa las/ /de'i shi lnga bcu rtsa bzhi byung/ /man ngag rgyal po'i phyag du gdams/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bdag gis drangs/ bod kyi ban+d+he bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
158 Gsg004.004 nga 39b4-50b4 rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs rgyud zhes bya ba san+ti ma hA dz+nyA na tsakra gu h+ya tsit+ta tan+t+ra nA ma rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho
198 Gsg004.005 nga 50b5-66a1 srog gi 'byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba h+ri da yo da ya ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza ma hA nA ma srog gi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhon nu bum pa'i zhabs kyis bsgyur ba'o// //
44 Gsg004.006 nga 66a2-82a3 rma bya mjing bsnol gyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu bla na med pa'i theg pa kring kring ra tsa sa da na tan+t+ra bo d+hi tsit+ta d+harma na ma byang chub kyi sems dpa' rma bya ma mjing bsnol zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal snying pos byang chub sems dpa' ro langs bde va'i theg pa la gdams rdzogs s+ho
1124 Gsg004.007 nga 82a4-87b4 byang chub kyi sems rma bya mjing bsnol gyir rgyud las/ mtha'i mun sel chen po zhes bya ba bo d+hi sa t+va dz+nyA na gar+b+ha kring ra tsa tan+t+ra su tra a rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po dang/ sbrul ba'i sangs rgyas re res mdzad pa so so'i/ don bstan pa'o rdzogs so
485 Gsg004.008 nga 87b4-112a3 lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud d+he ka sarba radza sa man ta b+ha dra ang ma b+hur pa tan tra lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs s+ho
489 Gsg004.009 nga 112a3-128a5 spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud
spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud gsung ba med pa'i mdzod/ sems kyi 'bras bu'i mchog rdzogs s+ho// //sa skya'i rgyud las skyar zhus dag
488 Gsg004.010 nga 128a6-147a1 phrin las thams cad kyi rgyal po skabs sbyor bdun pa'i rgyud sa tsa karma sarba rA dza tan tra rdzogs s+ho
487 Gsg004.011 nga 147a1-161b6 rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud ces bya ba sa mA d+h+ya gra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma rdzogs s+ho

1170 Gsg044.034 phi 303b3-309b2 gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po ha la 'bar ba'i snying gsang ba'i rgyud aYk+Sha sarba rA dza ha la dz+va le tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra
1171 Gsg044.035 phi 309b2-318b1 gnod sbyin rdo rje stag mda'i rgyud bya g+hi tra badzra yak+Sha tan tra
1172 Gsg044.036 phi 318b1-329a7 dge bsnyen dgra gsang nag po'i rgyud ces bya ba u pa si ka kA la sho na tan+t+ra na ma
1173 Gsg044.037 phi 329a7-333a4 mon pa phung byed nor bsrungs kyi rgyud ces bya ba sa mun+t+ra du ma sha truM ha ra tan+t+ra nA ma
1179 Gsg044.038 phi 333a4-343b3 gir spu gri nag po'i rgyud ces bya ba ku ta ra du tsakra de ba tan+t+ra na ma
1176 Gsg044.039 phi 343b3-348a2 bdud khros pa thos pa'i phreng ba can gsar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba mA ran kro d+ha ka pA la gu h+ya tan tra na ma
1177 Gsg044.040 phi 348a2-354a3 snying zor nag po'i rgyud ces bya ba ta tsit+ta thun kA la nA ma tan tra
1178 Gsg044.041 phi 354a3-358a7 srog gzer nag po ging gis spu gri/ 'khrul 'khor nag po'i rgyud shrI ya maM ta g+hu ya so ri ge tu tsakra tan tra
1179 Gsg044.042 phi 358a7-369b2 spu gri nag po'i rgyud ces bya ba mrig srhisna tan tra nama
1180 Gsg044.043 phi 369b2-379a4 drag po'i sngags rgod chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud e ru tra man tra ma hA tan tra rA dza
1181 Gsg044.044 phi 379a4-389a6 mu stegs drag sngags nag po'i rgyud tir ti ka la man tra man+t+ra
1182 Gsg044.045 phi 389a6-393b4 mu stegs kyi gsad khram chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud tir ti ka mA ra nA ma hA ma tan+t+ra
1183 Gsg044.046 phi 393b4-400b2 bram ze gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba brah+ma gu h+ye tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
1184 Gsg044.047 phi 400b2-402b7 sangs rgyas bstan pa'i dgra la/ gnam lcags drag po'i thog dbab pa lha min mtshon cha ka ma la'i rgyud zhes bya ba sha truM nA sha ya/ de ba ba tha ra/ ban dza ka la hur thums so ri ka tan+t+ra nA ma
1185 Gsg044.048 phi 402b7-411b6 nag po gsang ba'i rgyud kA la tsit+ta tan+t+ra gu h+ya
1186 Gsg044.049 phi 411b6-415b3 srog bdag gser gyi rta ba'i rgyud rtsa rang gar be go rar s+va tan+t+ra
1187 Gsg044.050 phi 415b3-434a7 btsan gyi rgyal po srog zan dmar po ri dmar 'joms pa'i rgyud a pi shu pri pi shu tsag shu ra tsa na d+ha ra man tan+t+ra
